document_data.name: Silverhand House
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverhand House''' was a trading coster in [[Highmoon]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was founded and owned by the retired adventurer [[Gaelin Silverhand]] just at the turn of the century. This company specialized in exporting rare woods, amber, resin and small-mammal furs along the [[East Way]] to the kingdoms of [[Cormyr]], via the metropolis [[Arabel]], and [[Sembia]] via its then-capital city of [[Ordulin]].
